30b4('dul ba): 'khob pa'i skad du/ dbus pa'i dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab la/ yul dbus pa'i dge slong gis kyang / mtha' 'khob pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na cir 'gyur lag/ nyes pa sbom
30b5('dul ba): por 'gyur ro/ / dbus pas dbus pa'i skad du/ mtha' 'khob pa'i dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab la/ mtha' 'khob pa'i dge slong gis kyang / dbus pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na
30b6('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyis/ dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags
30b7('dul ba): nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dben pa la dben par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//
31a1('dul ba): dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mi dben pa la dben par 'du
31a2('dul ba): shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mi dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis
31a3('dul ba): skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'du lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis sman nam gsang sngags kyis bdag nyid mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham
31a4('dul ba): pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis/ gzhan las dge slong zhig la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab
31a5('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ / nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gzhan rnams kyi slad du gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por
31a6('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis/ khyim pa la gzhi ma mchis par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// za ba dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung
31a7('dul ba): ba dang / ma gsod pa dang / pha gsod pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can zhugs pa dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / dang po mi mthun pa can dang / sngar ltung ba
31b1('dul ba): byung ba la gzhi ma mchis par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis/ dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham par
31b2('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / gnas par mi bya ba
31b3('dul ba): dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / khas blangs pa dang / bslab pa stsal ba'i dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re
31b4('dul ba): zhig dge slong zhig gis/ dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa las/ de'i mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re
31b5('dul ba): zhig dge slong ma zhig gis/ dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa las/ de'i mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red na cing 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun
31b6('dul ba): pa re zhig dge slong gis/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//
31b7('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen
32a1('dul ba): par rdzogs par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bstan par/
32a2('dul ba): rdzogs par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis/ mi'i dge slong la mir 'du shes
32a3('dul ba): pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// mi la mi lags par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa
32a4('dul ba): btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// /
32a5('dul ba): mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes pas/ pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham
32a6('dul ba): pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lag/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// / sdom lang dang po mtha' dang mtshams med pa// lhag ma dang ni gcig la gcig/ bris pa dang ni bag tsam nyid
32a7('dul ba): rgya cher bya ba nyid yin no/ / btsun pa re zhig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa las byung ba'i chos bsten to zhes khas len pa de la/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par
32b1('dul ba): rku ba 'am/ gsod pa 'am/ bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra bas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong bdag nyid ngas yo byad chen po brkus so zhes
32b2('dul ba): khas len pa de la/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par gsod pa 'am/ bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra ba 'am/ mi tshangs par spyod pas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//
32b3('dul ba): btsun pa re zhig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi srog dang phral lo zhes khas len pa de la/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra 'am/ mi tshangs par spyod pa 'am/ rku bas skur pa
32b4('dul ba): btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi'i chos bla mar gyur pa smras so zhes khas len pa de la/ dge slong zhog gis gzhi ma mchis par mi
32b5('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa 'am/ rku ba 'am/ srog gcod par skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis
32b6('dul ba): par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par mtshams med pas skur pa
32b7('dul ba): btab na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te ma dang / pha dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pas skur pa btab na/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// 'on te gzhi med par dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / ngan sems kyis
33a1('dul ba): khrag 'byin pas skur pa btab na ni/ nyes byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor gang gis pa dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pas skur pa btab pa dor/ pam/
33a2('dul ba): pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab pa yin no// gang gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pas skur pa btab pa des ni/ nyes pa sbom pos skur pa btab pa yin te/ nyes pa sbom
33a3('dul ba): pos ni dge slong ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi/ de ni bshags par 'os pa yin no// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis/ dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na/ dge 'dun lhag
33a4('dul ba): mar 'gyur na/ gal te gzhi ma mchis par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung byed du 'gyur ro// zhi ma mchis par ses sa saga' par dgyi ba dang / zhe kyis kyis sur pab na cir 'gyur lags zhes
33a5('dul ba): so/ / de bzhin du gzhi ma mchis par nyes pa sbom pos skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi med par pham pa'i
33a6('dul ba): chos kyis skur pa btab na ni/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis/ dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par
33a7('dul ba): pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong mas dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags
33b1('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong mas dge slong la pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la
33b2('dul ba): gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skar pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slob mas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma
33b3('dul ba): la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge tshul gyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la gzhi
33b4('dul ba): ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge tshul mas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis
33b5('dul ba): par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bdag nyid kyis bris nas 'di skad ces/ yi ge 'di las ni 'di skad du khyod mi tshangs par
33b6('dul ba): spyod pa'i pham pa byung zhes zer ro zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong gis/ dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab kyang /
33b7('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag mar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ yod de/ sngar ltung ba byung ba dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / dang po mi mthun pa can dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba la ni nyes
34a1('dul ba): byas so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong gang khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas
34a2('dul ba): ci nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang phral lo snyam nas/ dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la/ gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin pa pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab pa las/ de dus gzhan zhig
34a3('dul ba): na dris kyang rung / ma dris kyang rung / rtsod pa de yang gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin pa yin la/ rtsod pa gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin pas/ bag tsam las bsams pa tsam gyi chos 'ga' zhig
34a4('dul ba): blangs par gyur la/ dge slong yang zhe sdang la gnas pas zhe sdang gis smras so zhe na/ dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/ gzhung lhag ma ni gzhi med pa ji lta ba bzhin du/
34a5('dul ba): bag tsam la rgya cher brjod par bya'o// / sdom lang ba shis pa dang ni gsol ba dang / gleng ba dang ni dran pa gnyis// bzhi pa 'dug dang ma bsgos dang / 'dun pas gcig dang nam mkha' la/
34a6('dul ba): 'dug pa rgyas pa nyid du bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i
34a7('dul ba): phyir rtul bar byed cing / dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug na/ dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbye/
34b1('dul ba): ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig/ dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug cig/ tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig/ dge 'dun mthun mi byed/
34b2('dul ba): kun tu dga' mi rtsod// mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing / chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/ ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa bde ba dang reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/ tshe dang ldan
34b3('dul ba): pa khyod dge 'dun 'byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ / dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na/ gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/ gal te mi gtong na gzhi de
34b4('dul ba): gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo// yang dag par bstan pa na/ gzhi de gtong
34b5('dul ba): na de lta na legs/ gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bshes pa'i tshig gis ma bsgo bar/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar
34b6('dul ba): bgyid na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bsgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi 'chags te/ dge 'dun
34b7('dul ba): la yang ngas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo nas/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgon/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka'
35a1('dul ba): sprul pa/ bsgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa bskrad pa'i
35a2('dul ba): las ma bgyis par ba shes pa'i tshig gis bsgo bar bgyid na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bsgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam
35a3('dul ba): nye bar 'khor mi 'chags te/ dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// btsun pa bskrad pa'i las bgyis te bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo bar bgyod da/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma
35a4('dul ba): bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro// btsun
35a5('dul ba): pa bskrad pa'i las ma bgyis par dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi zhing / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi na cir 'gyur labs/
35a6('dul ba): nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar mi bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal
35a7('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / bskrad pa'i las bgyis nas dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi zhing / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa 'gro ba'o zhes mchi
35b1('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags te/
35b2('dul ba): dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig ma glengs dran par ma bgyis par/ bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so//
35b3('dul ba): bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar mi bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi 'chags so// btsun pa re zhig glengs shing dran
35b4('dul ba): par bgyis pa las/ bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo
35b5('dul ba): bar bya'o/ / bsgo ba 'chags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags so// mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag kaus/ mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa la bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam
35b6('dul ba): nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ / mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag gis/ mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag la bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re zhig/
35b7('dul ba): dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis pas/ mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag la bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re zhig dge slong
36a1('dul ba): las bgyid pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas/ mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag la bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun
36a2('dul ba): pa re zhig dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams mnan cing / mtshams non par bgyis te/ mtshams su mchi nas bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ nye bar
36a3('dul ba): 'khor bsgo ba zhes bya'o/ / bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags so// btsun pa dge slong las bgyid par ma bskos pa zhig gis/ mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi
36a4('dul ba): bskrad na/ bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re zhig dge slong las bgyod par bskos pas/ mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag gzhi zhig bskrad na
36a5('dul ba): bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sam/ gal te des re re dang / gnyis gnyis dang / gsum gsum nas bskrad kyi/ bzhir ma yin na bskrad pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams
36a6('dul ba): kyi nang phyogs bzhin/ mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong mchis pa dag gis/ dge slong bzhi zhig la bsgo na/ bsgo bar yang chud la/ ltung ba gang du yang mi 'gyur zhing / des dge 'dun mi mthun
36a7('dul ba): par yang mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor gal te phan tshun 'dun pa byin pas/ re re dang / gnyis gnyis dang / gsum gsum la bsgo'o// bzhi la ma yin na yod do//
36b1('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las dag byung mi rung bas so// las bgyid pa phrogs gcig na mchis pas gnas bzhi'i las thams cad bgyir rung lags sam/ che bar 'khor 'di lta
36b2('dul ba): dge slong las byed pas gnas bzhi car gyi mtshams kyi mdo/ / khri 'am/ khri'u 'am/ re lde 'am/ re lde ljongs rings kyis mnan te 'dug par gyur la/ gnas de dag na yang las 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/
36b3('dul ba): bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang / lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang / bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang / nyi shu'i tshos kyis bya ba'i las nye bar gnas par gyur na rung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de de dag kha cig gis ni
36b4('dul ba): las byed pa yin la/ kha cig gi ni tshog skong ba yin no// sa la mchis pas nam mkha' la mchis pa rnams la bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re zhig las bgyid
36b5('dul ba): pa nam mkha' la mchis la/ sa la mchis pa rnams la bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// ji ltar dge slong la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du
36b6('dul ba): bslab pa byin pa dang / dge slong ma la yang dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes byas so// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la yang
36b7('dul ba): nyes byas kho na ste/ snga ma bzhin no// de ltar na gzhung 'di ni dge 'dun lhag ma gsum la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya ba yin no// nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ kha che pa las dge 'dun lhag
37a1('dul ba): ma rdzogs so/ / sdom la mtha' dang lam dang rgyal rigs dang // phung po de bzhin lug sa dang // kha dang sha khar dang dwags// bu ram mngags
37a2('dul ba): mnges gnyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyi zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu
37a3('dul ba): gcig dang / dben pa skyabs yod pa na/ 'dod pa byar rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing / de la gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gsum po pham par 'gyur ba 'am/
37a4('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed las gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la/ dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na/ chos gsum po pham par 'gyur ba 'am/ dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed
37a5('dul ba): las chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing / dge slong de la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhug ste/
37a6('dul ba): de ni ma nges pa'i chos so// yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang / dben pa skyabs yod pa na/ 'dod pa byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing / de la gal
37a7('dul ba): tedage bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing / dge slong la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i
37b1('dul ba): tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhug ste/ de yang ma nges pa'i chos so zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge bsnyen
37b2('dul ba): ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong mtha' dang po 'byin par bgyid par mthong ngo zhes mchi na// dge bsnyen
37b3('dul ba): ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du sbru la tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//
37b4('dul ba): gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go//
37b5('dul ba): 'on te de 'di skad ces 'di mtha' dang po ni ma byung gi/ 'on kyang bdag gis mtha' gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa byung ba mthong ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// dang po
37b6('dul ba): ji lta bar/ mtha gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rnams la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi
37b7('dul ba): drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis kha'i lam du nyams par bgyis pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis
38a1('dul ba): bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di/
38a2('dul ba): skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te/
38a3('dul ba): de 'di skad ces 'dis kha'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas te/ 'on kyang bshang ba'i lam dang / gci ba'i lam du nyams par byas so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ kha'i lam
38a4('dul ba): du ji lta bar/ bshang ba'i lam dang / gci ba'i lam du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas
38a5('dul ba): 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag dge slong zhig/ rgyal rigs ma zhig dang lhan cig tu nyams par bgyid pa bdag gis mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid
38a6('dul ba): dusbrul tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du sprul tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te de 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/
38a7('dul ba): gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te de 'di skad ces 'dis rgyal rigs dang
38b1('dul ba): lhan cig tu nyams par nim byas na/ 'on kyang bram ze mo dang lhan cig tu nyams par gyur to zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// rgyal rigs mo dang ji lta bar/ bram ze mo dang / rje'u rigs mo
38b2('dul ba): dang / dmangs rigs mo dang / dkar mo dang / sngon mo dang / sngo bsangs mo dang / ring mo dang / thung ngu mo dang / sbu gu ma dang / skem mo dang / tshon mo dang / lus ngan ma dang / 'gro
38b3('dul ba): ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'gyel ba dang yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di
38b4('dul ba): skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig mtha' dang po'i phung po 'byon par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam
38b5('dul ba): byed du mi gzhug go/ / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar
38b6('dul ba): bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ 'on te de 'di skad ces mtha' dang po'i phung po ni ma byung
38b7('dul ba): / 'on kyang ltung ba'i phung po gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa byung ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par brjod do// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig
39a1('dul ba): m+b+hag rlung na mtsham nas padi skad sa/ btsun pa dag bdu nas dge slong nas 'dun lhag ma dang po 'dzin sna btsud pa mthong dgas /
39a2('dul ba): ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du sbrul tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du sprul tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar
39a3('dul ba): bya'o/ / gal te 'di skad ces yod ngo zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar byaste/ la te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / dada' rnga ba nyid nol du
39a4('dul ba): gzhug go/ / 'on te de 'di skad ces dge 'dun lhag ma dang po ni ma byung gi/ 'on kyang dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa nas/ bcu gsum pa'i bar byung ngo zhes zer na/
39a5('dul ba): dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// dang po la ji lta bar/ dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas/ bcu gsum pa'i bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid
39a6('dul ba): ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong gis khar nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid
39a7('dul ba): ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du sprul tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//
39b1('dul ba): gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzug cing / de de'i rang bzhin chol du gzhug go// 'on te 'di
39b2('dul ba): skad ces khar ni nyams par ma byas kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis so'i phyi rol mchu'i nang du khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong
39b3('dul ba): rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gci ba'i lam du nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du sprul tam/
39b4('dul ba): byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ta ma/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya/
39b5('dul ba): ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te de 'di skad ces gci ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas kyi/
39b6('dul ba): 'on kyang 'dis brla phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces
39b7('dul ba): btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis bshang ba'i lam du nyams par bgyis pa mthong ngo zhes mchis na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed
40a1('dul ba): du mi gzhug go/ / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/
40a2('dul ba): gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te de 'di skad ces bshang ba'i lam du ni
40a3('dul ba): nyams par ma byas kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis rkub ces kyi phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams
40a4('dul ba): kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma yin par skyo ma 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yod ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du
40a5('dul ba): sprul tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du sprul tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhe dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhe zer na/
40a6('dul ba): gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ 'on te de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par
40a7('dul ba): skyo ma ni ma 'thungs kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis sha kha ra'i chu 'thungs so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed gzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du
40b1('dul ba): mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig bu ram chang 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du sprul tam/ byed du mi
40b2('dul ba): gzhug go/ / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du sbrul tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/
40b3('dul ba): gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te 'di skad ces 'dis dus ma yin par bu ram gyi chang ma 'thungs kyi
40b4('dul ba): 'on kyang 'dis hwags kyi chu 'thungs so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// / bam po bzhi pa// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig
40b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma yin par sha za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam
40b6('dul ba): byed du mi gzhug go/ / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/
40b7('dul ba): gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par sha ni ma zos kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis bu
41a1('dul ba): ram zhig zos so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces
41a2('dul ba): btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma lags par kha zas za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i ngo bo
41a3('dul ba): nyid tshol du sprul tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes ze na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya'o// gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid
41a4('dul ba): ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ / 'on te 'di skad ces dus ma yin pa'i zas ni ma zos kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis mar zos so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du
41a5('dul ba): gzhug go/ / de lta bu'i dngos po ma nges pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ bden pa mthong ba smra ba gang dag yin pa de dag la/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go// nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/
41a6('dul ba): kha che pa las ma nges pa dang ldan pa rdzogs so// / sdom la/ de nyid stor dang tshig pa dang // sems 'khrugs byin gyis ma brlabs dang / rung ba dang ni dus las 'das// mtshan dang
41a7('dul ba): bzhi dang bting ba'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang phyung
41b1('dul ba): nas/ zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa rung bar ma byas pa bcang bar bya'o// de las 'das par bcangs na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa chos gos de nyid dgung bcu
41b2('dul ba): 'das pa yang lags la/ de nyid dgung gcig bral ba yang lags pa lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong gis zhag bcu 'das pa'i chos gos byin gyis brlabs nas/
41b3('dul ba): chos gos med par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ chos gos 'di ni zhag bcu 'das pa yang yin la/ zhag gcig bral ba yang yin no// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos
41b4('dul ba): nyams par gyur na/ ltung ba bshags par bgyi 'am/ nye bar 'khor 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung ba bshags par bya'o// gal te lhung ba bshags lags nas slar rnyed na spang bar bgyis 'am/ nye bar 'khor
41b5('dul ba): ma yin no/ / btsun pa re zhig dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos mes tshig gam zos par gyur na/ dum bu de dag spang bar bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin te/ 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung ba bshags
41b6('dul ba): par bya'o/ / 'on te kun nas khru gang ba zhig yin na spang bar bya'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas/ dgung lnga lon pa dang sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ gang nas bzung ste/ de'i
41b7('dul ba): dgung bcu bgrang bar bgyi lags/ gang nas bzung ste/ rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so// btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos brgyad dam dgu zhig byin gyis ma brlabs/ rung bar ma bgyis par nam
42a1('dul ba): 'tsho'i bar du bcangs na/ nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ dge slong gis nyi ma re re zhig chos gos las byung ste/ gzhan byin gyis
42a2('dul ba): brlob na'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bcu las 'das pa'i chos gos spang ba'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos lhag pa dgung bcu las 'das par bcwa
42a3('dul ba): kyang / spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar gos kyi spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la/ spun mi rung bar gyur pa
42a4('dul ba): dang nyagan+thi ka mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba glang gi spu dang / ra bal dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / 'dres pa dang / thags su ma btags pa ste/ de lta bu'i chos gos ni zhag bcu las
42a5('dul ba): lhag par bcangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams kyis zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong
42a6('dul ba): gis nam 'tsho'i bar du chos gos lhag pa bcangs kyang / nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod do// zhag bcu tshun chad du dus las 'das par gyur na'o// btsun pa chos gos
42a7('dul ba): de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la/ chos gos de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang bar yang 'gyur ba lha mchis lags sam// nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong de chos gos rin chen po 'chang na srung
42b1('dul ba): ba med la/ mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red de 'chang na ltung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung bcu lags pa dang / de'i mtshan gyur nas/ dge slong mar red nas
42b2('dul ba): dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas chos gos shig rnyed nas dgung bcu ma lags pa dang / mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red nas dgung
42b3('dul ba): bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dgung bcu la dgung bcur 'du shes te skra rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed
42b4('dul ba): du 'gyur ro/ / dgung bcu la dgung bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro//
42b5('dul ba): dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas su chos gos shig rnyed la/ chos gos de
42b6('dul ba): yang spang bar 'gyur ba lha mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong gi chos gos spang ba yin la/ dge slong des kyang chos gos de ma spangs/ bral bar ma byas/ nyes pa ma ba#
42b7('dul ba): pa'i skabs su dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting bar gyur la/ sra brkyang bting nas/ dge slong des chos gos gzhan zhig rnyed na'o// btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas dpung bcu las lhag par chos
43a1('dul ba): gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dgung bcu las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs ma
43a2('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul mas dgung bcu las 'das par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// sngar
43a3('dul ba): ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/ snga ma bzhin no// // sdom la/ dge 'dun gyis dang sa dang mtshams// mnan pa dang ni ma gnang dang // mtshams ma bcad dang ma g.yogs
43a4('dul ba): dang / / bzhi tshan dang ni de bzhin mtshan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong chos gos zin pas
43a5('dul ba): sra brkyang phyung na/ gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar byed na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te/ spang ba'i ltung
43a6('dul ba): byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge 'dun gyi chos gos byin gyis brlab par gnang lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi gnang ngo // btsun pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig mchis na gnang
43a7('dul ba): lags sam/ nye bar 'khor gnang ngo // btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi chos gos byin gyis brlabs te/ chos gos ma mchis par mtshams kyi slad rol tu bral bar bgyid na
43b1('dul ba): chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o// chos gos de spang bar bgyi lags sam/ nye bar
43b2('dul ba): 'khor ma yin no/ / 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung byed bshags par bya'o// btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos sa la bzhag ste/ nam mkha' la skya rengs 'char bar bgyid dam/ chos gos nam
43b3('dul ba): mkha' la bzhag ste/ sa la skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes
43b4('dul ba): bya'o/ / btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos mtshams kyi nang du bzhag ste/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid dam/ chos gos mtshams kyi slad rol tu bzhag ste/ mtshams
43b5('dul ba): kyi nang du skya rangs 'char bar bgyid na/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa re
43b6('dul ba): zhig dge slong gis mtshams mnan nam/ mtshams bzung nas/ mtshams su 'greng ngam mchis te/ mtshams kyi bar du chos gos bzhag nas skya rengs 'chang bar bgyid na/ chos gos dang
43b7('dul ba): bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge slong yang mtshams kyi nang nas tshis la/ chos gos
44a1('dul ba): mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa las/ chos gos de dang bral ba gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ mtshams bcod par bya ba chos gos dang mi 'bral/
44a2('dul ba): ba'i sdom pa ma byin no// btsun pa re zhig mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su gang tshun chad dge slong chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi/ nye bar 'khor ji tsam/ btsug lag khang gi nye 'khor cha bkung
44a3('dul ba): sa'am/ sgo khyams sam/ khang phran nam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa lang/ rab 'am/ 'greng rib bam/ 'obs yod pa'o// btsun pa dge slong yang gnas gcig la/ steng
44a4('dul ba): g.yogs kyang gcig pa zhig na mchis la/ de nyid na chos gos kyang mchis na/ chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar ga na de mu stegs can sna tshogs dang
44a5('dul ba): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu rnams sam/ spun nor bgos pa rnams kyi yin na'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol la mtshams kyi slad rol tu 'du shes pas
44a6('dul ba): rgya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi slad rol tu 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// mtshams kyi slad rol
44a7('dul ba): la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mtshams/
44b1('dul ba): kyi nang du chos gos gzhag ste/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu rgya rengs shar bar bgyis pa las/ mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red na tsang chu sa/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig sa/
44b2('dul ba): slong ma zhig gis mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag la/ mtshams kyi slad ros tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid pa las/ mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du reng matsor 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed
44b3('dul ba): du 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa dge slong gis gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong gis ni/ dge slong gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya'o// btsun pa
44b4('dul ba): dge slong mas gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong mas ni/ dge slong ma'i mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dbyung ba dang rung bar bya ba yang de bzhin
44b5('dul ba): du bya'o/ / btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal ba chos gos ma mchis par/ mtshams kyi slad rol du skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/ de bzhin du dge
44b6('dul ba): slong ma la ni chos gos lngas spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes pa med do// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/
44b7('dul ba): snga ma bzhin no// // sdom la/ sems 'khrugs pa dang dus las 'das/ de bzhin rung ba nyid dang ni/ mi rung dang gding ba dang / tshad dang bzhi tshan dag dang mtshan// sangs rgyas
45a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas// dus ma yin pa
45a2('dul ba): gos rnyed la/ 'dod na dge slong des chos gos de blang bar bya'o// blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba kho nar chos gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o// gal te mi langs la kham langs pa kha skong ba'i gos
45a3('dul ba): la re ba yod na yang / dge slong des chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o// de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge
45a4('dul ba): slong gis chos gos shig rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ gang nas bzung ste/ de'i zla ba bgrang bar bgyi/ gang nas bzung ste/ rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so// btsun pa bcom
45a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis zla ba gcig gi bar du chos gos gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du chos gos gzhag kyang ltung bar mi
45a6('dul ba): 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ zla ba gcig tshun chad du dus byas na'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par
45a7('dul ba): bya'o/ / zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa chos gos de ji lta bu zhig lags/ bdun po dag las btags pa gang yang rung ba ngas rjes su gnang zhing ma bkag pa gang yin pa'o// btsun pa bcom
45b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis dgung zla gcig las lhag par gzhag kyang spang ba'i ltung
45b2('dul ba): byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ de 'di ltar chos gos kyi spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang / spun mi rung bar gyur la/ rgyu rung bar gyur pa dang /

45b5('dul ba): dge slong gis dgung zla drug tu chos gos gzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod do// chos gos de rnyed nas zhag sum cu lon pa dang / dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting
45b6('dul ba): bar gyur na'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ chos gos gsum du ma tshang na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag go zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gang chos gos gsum tshang bar gyur
45b7('dul ba): pa des/ chos gos mi langs pa zhig rnyed na/ des kyang dgung zla gcig gi bar du gzhag par bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor chos gos gsum tshang na/
46a1('dul ba): chos gos gzhan rnyed pa gang yin pa ni langs kyang rung / mi langs kyang rung ste/ de thams cad ni zhag bcu pa yin no// chos gos gsum du ma tshang ba las gal te chos gos su
46a2('dul ba): langs pa zhig rnyed na/ de yang zhag bcu pa yin no// 'on te ma langs pa zhig rnyed na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o// de las 'das par gzhag na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun
46a3('dul ba): pa re zhig dge slong gis dgung zla gcig la gcig tu 'du shes pas/ skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dgung zla gcig la dkrung zla gcig ma lags
46a4('dul ba): par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig tu 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig
46a5('dul ba): ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red nas dgung zla gcig
46a6('dul ba): las 'da' bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas chos gos rnyed nas dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du reng nas
46a7('dul ba): dgung zla gcig las 'da' bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal pas chos gos dgung zla gcig pas ring du gzhag na cir 'gyur lags
46b1('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas chos gos dgung zla gcig pas ring du bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang / dge tshul
46b2('dul ba): dang / dge tshul mas chos gos dgung zla gcig gi bar du bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni zhes byas te snga ma bzhin no// sdom
46b3('dul ba): la/ pho nya yi ge lag brda dang / gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang // smon ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang // tshor ba 'o na ma glen ma dang // khyim pa mo la sogs pa ste// bslab pa byin pa tha
46b4('dul ba): ma'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la/ chos
46b5('dul ba): gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshod du 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa
46b6('dul ba): la/ pho nya las gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// de bzhin du yi ge dang / lag brda dang / gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang / brgyud de dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa
46b7('dul ba): chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa sgron ma la/ chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur
47a1('dul ba): lags/ nyes byas so// de bzhin du dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyam thag pa dang / 'on ma dang / glen ma la/ chos gos rnying
47a2('dul ba): 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim pa mo nyi du ma lags pa la/ chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// de bzhin du
47a3('dul ba): dge slong ma tha dad du gnas pa dang / dge slong ma khas len pa dang / ma ning mo dang / dge slong sun phyung ba dang / ma 'gums pa dang / pa 'gums pa dang / dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang / mu stegs
47a4('dul ba): can dang / mu stegs can zhugs pa dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / dang po mi mthun pa can dang / sngar ltung ba byung ba nye du ma lags pa la/ chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol
47a5('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang
47a6('dul ba): bslab pa stsal ba'i dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/ chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// / sdom lang bsgrub par bya dang bkrus
47a7('dul ba): pa dang / / dge 'dun gyi dang mtshan gnyis dang // mi rung ba dang spangs pa dang // gzhan gyi dang ni gyon pa dang // bzhi tshan dag tu byas pa dang // dge slong ma ni tha ma yin/ btsun par
47b1('dul ba): zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa bsgrub par bgyi ba zhig/ 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa bkrus//
47b2('dul ba): pa zhig/ 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te gang
47b3('dul ba): zag gir yongs su spyad pas yongs su spyad de/ dri ma can du gyur pa zhig na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'on te gnas mal gyi dngos po zhig 'khrur bcug na ni ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhig dge slong
47b4('dul ba): gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol pa las/ mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas nye du ma lags pa'i
47b5('dul ba): dge slong la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur sprul ba las/ mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong ma la chos gro rnying pa 'khrur stsal
47b6('dul ba): pabalnga/ dge slong ma de'i mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas bkrus na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas te/ de bzhin du dge slong ma la sbyar bar bya'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos
47b7('dul ba): gos rnying pa 'khrur srul kyang / spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la/
48a1('dul ba): spun mi rung ba dang / gnyis ka mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba glang gi spu dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / ra bal dang / 'dres pa dang / ma btags pa'o//
48a2('dul ba): de lta bu'i chos gos 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos rnying pa spang ba zhig/ dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags
48a3('dul ba): gal te ma spangs pa zhig 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ / 'on te spangs pa zhig 'khrur 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/
48a4('dul ba): gzhan gyi chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa dge slong gis gos rung ba dang / grong du 'jug la spang ba dang / 'byung ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar
48a5('dul ba): 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong khyim du zhugs pa'i chos gos bshang ba 'am/ gci ba 'am/ 'dam rdzab bam/ ldan ljin nam/ mi gtsang ba gzhan gyis 'phags par gyur na'o// des de dag
48a6('dul ba): slong ma nye du ma lags pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'khrur stsol ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bgyis par
48a7('dul ba): bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags pa bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa
48b1('dul ba): sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/
48b2('dul ba): nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur legs/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par
48b3('dul ba): rdzogs te lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/

48b5('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ / dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma
48b6('dul ba): rdzogs pa la/ bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la/ bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur
48b7('dul ba): lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas/ chos gos rnying pa 'khrur sgrol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du
49a1('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ / dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/
49a2('dul ba): nyes byas so// dge slong ma nye du lags pa la nya dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la chos gos rnying
49a3('dul ba): pa 'khrur 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / khyim pa po dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram
49a4('dul ba): ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu rnams la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so//
49a5('dul ba): dge slong mas dge slong dang / dge tshul dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur stsol na
49a6('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// khyim pa dang / khyim pa mo la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la ni nyes byas so//
49a7('dul ba): sngar lhung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/ snga ma bzhin no// de bzhin du 'tshod pa dang / 'chag pa la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o// sdom lang po nya yi ge lag brda dang /
49b1('dul ba): gzhan la skad 'dogs brgyud pa dang // smyon ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang // tshor ba 'on ma glen ma dang // gnyid logar ro rab spyos dang // snyoms zhugs de bzhin 'gro ba dang // khas len dang
49b2('dul ba): pa la sogs pa/ bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong gang dag
49b3('dul ba): slong ma nye du ma yin pa las chos gos len na/ brje ba ma rtogs te/ spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong ngas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/ pho nya las
49b4('dul ba): chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// de bzhin du yi ge dang / lag brda dang / gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang / brgyud pas
49b5('dul ba): nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong ma de la chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma 'gas pa/ smyon ma la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/
49b6('dul ba): nyes byas so// chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyam thag pa dang / glen ma dang / 'on ma dang / gnyid log pa dang /
49b7('dul ba): phyag las khom pa dang / rab tu myos pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / khas len pa dang / ma ning mo dang / dge slong sun phyung ba
50a1('dul ba): nas/ rgyas par dang po mi mthun pa can gyi bar la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// btsun par
50a2('dul ba): zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang / dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / bslab pa sprul

50a4('dul ba): bzhin mtshan dang ni/ dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/ choms su yang dag bshad pa yin// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos blangs kyang /

51b1('dul ba): dge slong dang / dge tshul las len na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// de bzhin du dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma las blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge tshul gyis dge slong ma dang /
51b2('dul ba): dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma las chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te// snga ma yin no// // sdom lang pho nya yi ge
51b3('dul ba): lag brda dang / / gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang // smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang // tshor ba 'on pa glen pa dang // gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang // snyoms zhugs 'gro dang phyi rol pa'o//
51b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma
51b5('dul ba): yin pa'i gan du song ste/ chos gos slong na dus ma gtogs te/ spang ba'i ltung byed do// de la dus ni 'di yin te/ dge slong chos gos phrogs sam/ chos gos nyams sam/ chos gos tshig
51b6('dul ba): gam/ chos gos khyer ram/ chos gos dengs na/ de la de ni dus yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis pho nya las khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma
51b7('dul ba): lags pa las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// de bzhin du yi ge dang / lag brda dang / gzhan la skad 'dogs pa dang /
52a1('dul ba): brgyud na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang smyon ma las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes
52a2('dul ba): byas so/ / chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// de bzhin du khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa/ sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyams thag pa dang /

52a4('dul ba): nyes byas so// chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu nye du ma lags

52a6('dul ba): mtshan dang ni/ / za ma ma ning nyid de bzhin// ma ning mo dang dge slong ma// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la/ chos gos
52a7('dul ba): bslangs te thob kyang / spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung ba dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la/ spun mi
52b1('dul ba): rung ba dang / gnyis ka mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga mo'i bal dang / ba glang gi spu dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / ra bal dang / 'dres pa dang / thags su ma btags pa de lta bu'i chos gos shig/
52b2('dul ba): slong na/ slong ba de la nyes byas so// chos gos thob na yang nyes byas kho na'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la/ nye du ma lags

52b5('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mi'i khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang la mir 'du shes pas/ chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so//

52b7('dul ba): byas kho na'o/ / mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la/
53a1('dul ba): bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes
